issue.title: [C++] BitmapAnd benchmarks are popcount-limited
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17305](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17305). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The `BitmapAnd` benchmarks in `bit_util_benchmark.cc` spend much of their time computing a popcount after running the actual operation (for the sake of ensuring the compiler didn't optimize it out).
